name: deep_research
description: Perform deep multi-pass web research on a topic, gathering information from multiple angles and synthesizing comprehensive findings

topic.description: The main topic to research thoroughly

aspects.description: Specific aspects to focus on (e.g., 'best practices, common pitfalls, performance considerations')

pipeline.prompt:
Research the fundamentals of: {{topic}}

Focus on:
- Official documentation and authoritative sources
- Core concepts and terminology
- Current state and latest versions/updates

Provide a foundational understanding with source citations.

Now dive deeper into: {{topic}}

Focus on these aspects: {{aspects}}

Research:
- Best practices and recommended approaches
- Common pitfalls and mistakes to avoid
- Real-world case studies and examples
- Expert opinions and community consensus

Build upon the foundational research already gathered.

Complete the research on: {{topic}}

Focus on:
- Advanced techniques and edge cases
- Performance considerations and optimization
- Security implications if applicable
- Future trends and roadmap
- Alternative approaches and trade-offs

Fill in any gaps from previous research passes.

Synthesize all the research gathered into a comprehensive, well-structured report on: {{topic}}

Organize the findings into:
1. Executive Summary (2-3 sentences)
2. Key Concepts
3. Best Practices
4. Common Pitfalls
5. Implementation Considerations
6. Resources & Further Reading

Ensure all claims are backed by the research findings. Highlight any conflicting information found.
